languages.text: {n}Префект не мигая смотрит вам в глаза. Ее губы медленно растягиваются в слабую улыбку, заметную только вам.{/n} "Оскорбления перед лицом неминуемого рока? Как низко, фон Валанциус. Вам под стать". {n}Она делает жест арбитрам и отворачивается.{/n}

{n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile visible only to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Префект не мигая смотрит вам в глаза. Ее губы медленно растягиваются в слабую улыбку, заметную только вам.{/n} "Оскорбления перед лицом неминуемого рока? Как низко, фон Валанциус. Вам под стать". {n}Она делает жест арбитрам и отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile that is only visible to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}

{n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile visible only to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin sieht dir unerschrocken in die Augen. Ihre Lippen verziehen sich zu einem schwachen Lächeln, das nur du sehen kannst.{/n} "Greift Ihr angesichts Eures nahenden Sturzes auf Beleidigungen zurück? Wie erbärmlich, von Valancius. Das passt gar nicht zu Euch." {n}Sie macht eine Geste in Richtung der Arbitratoren und wendet sich ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile visible only to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin sieht dir unerschrocken in die Augen. Ihre Lippen verziehen sich zu einem schwachen Lächeln, das nur du sehen kannst.{/n} "Greift Ihr angesichts Eures nahenden Sturzes auf Beleidigungen zurück? Wie erbärmlich, von Valancius. Das passt gar nicht zu Euch." {n}Sie macht eine Geste in Richtung der Arbitratoren und wendet sich ab.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La préfète vous regarde droit dans les yeux sans ciller. Ses lèvres esquissent lentement un infime sourire que vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez voir.{/n} « On en vient aux insultes face à sa chute imminente ? C'est vraiment petit, von Valancius. Un peu comme vous. » {n}Elle fait signe aux arbitrators, puis se détourne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile visible only to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète vous regarde droit dans les yeux sans ciller. Ses lèvres esquissent lentement un infime sourire que vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez voir.{/n} « On en vient aux insultes face à sa chute imminente ? C'est vraiment petit, von Valancius. Un peu comme vous. » {n}Elle fait signe aux arbitrators, puis se détourne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行政官目不转睛地盯着你，嘴角慢慢露出了淡淡的笑容，只有你才能看得到。{/n}“看到自己大势已去，便开始口吐粗鄙之言，是吗？太低级了，冯·瓦兰修斯，但确实很像你会做的事情。”{n}她朝周围的法务官做了个手势，之后便转身走开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile visible only to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官目不转睛地盯着你，嘴角慢慢露出了淡淡的笑容，只有你才能看得到。{/n}“看到自己大势已去，便开始口吐粗鄙之言，是吗？太低级了，冯·瓦兰修斯，但确实很像你会做的事情。”{n}她朝周围的法务官做了个手势，之后便转身走开了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prefecta te mira sin pestañear, esbozando una leve sonrisa que solo tú puedes ver.{/n} «¿Recurre a los insultos ante su inminente caída? Qué rastrero, von Valancius. Le viene como anillo al dedo». {n}Gesticula hacia los Arbitrator y te da la espalda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile visible only to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta te mira sin pestañear, esbozando una leve sonrisa que solo tú puedes ver.{/n} «¿Recurre a los insultos ante su inminente caída? Qué rastrero, von Valancius. Le viene como anillo al dedo». {n}Gesticula hacia los Arbitrator y te da la espalda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総監はまばたきもせずにあなたの目を見る。彼女の唇がゆっくりと伸び、あなただけに見えるかすかな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「破滅が目前に迫っているのに、侮辱に頼るのですか？なんて卑劣なんでしょう、フォン・ヴァランシウス。あなたらしくないですね」{n}彼女はアービトレイターたちに向かって合図し、背を向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile visible only to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総監はまばたきもせずにあなたの目を見る。彼女の唇がゆっくりと伸び、あなただけに見えるかすかな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「破滅が目前に迫っているのに、侮辱に頼るのですか？なんて卑劣なんでしょう、フォン・ヴァランシウス。あなたらしくないですね」{n}彼女はアービトレイターたちに向かって合図し、背を向ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Prefekt, gözünü kırpmadan senin gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Dudakları yavaşça, sadece senin görebileceğin kadar belli belirsiz bir gülümsemeyle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Yaklaşan çöküş karşısında hakaretlere mi başvuruyorsunuz? Ne kadar da yavan bir davranış. Size pek yakışıyor." {n}Yargıcılara işaret verip arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks you in the eye without blinking. Her lips slowly stretch into a faint smile visible only to you.{/n} "Resorting to insults in the face of imminent downfall? How base, von Valancius. Not unlike yourself." {n}She makes a gesture toward the Arbitrators and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt gözünü kırpmadan senin gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Dudakları yavaşça, sadece senin görebileceğin kadar belli belirsiz bir gülümsemeyle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Yaklaşan çöküşün karşısında hakaretlere mi başvuruyorsunuz? Ne kadar da yavan bir davranış Von Valancius. Tıpkı sizin gibi." {n}Yargıcılara işaret edip arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
